description:
Play Team Troopers a team-based low poly art first-person shooter! Play with your friends online and fight in epic matches in a great low poly stylized world.

Play epic matches in team death match, capture the flag or free for all. Be the frag leader, Sneak into the enemies base and steal their flag, or win as a team and earn coins to customize your soldier or weapons! The core game modes are the free for all and Team Death mode offline against bots in addition  you can play online with or against your friends.
Level up to upgrade your default loadout and buy attachments for your weapons to get your weapon your way.

Features:
- Action-packed first-person shooter with online functionality
- Play against BOTS
- Small shooting range to test the weapons
- Many different weapons to unlock and scope attachments to customize your weapons
- Vehicles at the shooting test range
- Three different game modes Free for all, Team Death Match and Capture the flag
- Four different Classes Assault,Recon,Medic,Support
Have fun !
name: Team Troopers
